text: us ghadee ka gyaan allaah kee or phirata hai. jo phal bhee apane koshon se nikalate hai aur jo maada bhee garbhavatee hotee hai aur bachcha janatee hai, anivaaryatah use in sabaka gyaan hota hai. jis din vah unhen pukaarega, "kahaan hai mere saajheedaar?" ve kahenge, "ham tere samaksh khullam-khulla kah chuke hai ki hamamen se koee bhee isaka gavaah nahin.
